mapper.select: select customer_no as customerNo, customer_id as customerId, customer_pw as customerPw, customer_name as customerName, phone as phone, birthday as birthday, email as email, gender as gender, customer_state as customerState, reg_date as regDate, lastLog_date as lastLogDate from customer where customer_id=#{customerId} and customer_pw=#{customerPw}

select customer_no as customerNo, customer_id as customerId, customer_pw as customerPw, customer_name as customerName, customer_nickname as customerNick, phone as phone, birthday as birthday, email as email, gender as gender, customer_state as customerState, reg_date as regDate, lastLog_date as lastLogDate from customer where customer_id=#{customerId} AND ROWNUM = 1

select customer_no as customerNo, customer_id as customerId, customer_pw as customerPw, customer_name as customerName, customer_nickname as customerNick, phone as phone, birthday as birthday, email as email, gender as gender, customer_state as customerState, reg_date as regDate, lastLog_date as lastLogDate from customer where customer_nickname=#{customerNick} AND ROWNUM = 1

select customer_no as customerNo, customer_id as customerId, customer_pw as customerPw, customer_name as customerName, customer_nickname as customerNick, phone as phone, birthday as birthday, email as email, gender as gender, customer_state as customerState, reg_date as regDate, lastLog_date as lastLogDate from customer where email=#{email} AND ROWNUM = 1

select rnum ,customer_no as customerNo ,customer_id as customerId ,customer_name as customerName ,customer_nickname as customerNick ,phone as phone ,birthday as birthday ,email as email ,gender as gender ,customer_state as customerState ,reg_date as regDate ,lastlog_date as lastLogDate from (select rownum as rnum, m.* from (select * from customer order by reg_date desc) m)
